body: Plan is to move all GOARCHes to SSA.  Not quite sure how we're organizing PPC64le vs PPC64be, but agreed le is more important.  I'm looking at the CL, I'm inclined to LGTM it permissively because it's a great start.  Still working on my own PPCle access (can log in, have no home dir, might complicate use of tool chain).
